hero.title: Worksy — Connect Talents to Opportunities
hero.subtitle: Worksy facilitates the meeting between freelancers, interns, and companies in Morocco. Discover missions, apply easily, and collaborate with confidence.
hero.localPlatform: Local platform designed for the Moroccan market — fast, simple, and secure.
hero.joinCommunity: Join a growing community of talents and employers.

problem.title: The Challenge for Moroccan Youth
problem.subtitle: Many qualified young people struggle to find suitable opportunities — lack of network, limited experience, and restricted access to companies.

unemployment.title: High Unemployment
unemployment.desc: The unemployment rate particularly affects young graduates in many regions.

experience.title: Lack of Experience
experience.desc: Companies often require experience that candidates haven't had the chance to acquire.

access.title: Limited Access
access.desc: Limited access to recruiters and missions — Worksy facilitates direct connection.

solution.title: Worksy Solution
solution.subtitle: Worksy connects talents and companies via simple tools: smart matching, verified profiles, and clear application process.

matching.title: Smart Matching
matching.desc: Simple but effective algorithm to match skills with suitable missions.

verified.title: Verified Profiles
verified.desc: Account and profile verification to strengthen trust between candidates and companies.

booking.title: Bookings & Applications
booking.desc: Apply, book interviews, and track your applications from your dashboard.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to start with Worksy

create.title: Create your account

find.desc: Search by category, filter by location and skills.

collaborate.title: Start collaborating
collaborate.desc: Exchange, plan, and start the mission — everything is centralized on Worksy.
